 17 
 18 /**
 19  * <p> Autocomplete input filed that suggests facet values. It can show facet values of multiple 
 20  * fields (specified by "fieldNames"), as well as perform a fulltext query ("fulltextFieldName")
 21  * in case no suggested value is selected. </p>
 22  *
 23  * It uses the autocomplete box found at http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Autocomplete/autocomplete.
 24  * 
 25  * @class AutocompleteWidget
 26  * @augments jQuery.solrjs.AbstractClientSideWidget
 27  */
 28 jQuery.solrjs.AutocompleteWidget = jQuery.solrjs.createClass ("AbstractClientSideWidget", /** @lends jQuery.solrjs.AutocompleteWidget.prototype */{ 
 29 
 30   /** 
 31    * A list of facet fields.
 32    * @field 
 33    * @public
 34    */
 35   fieldNames : [] ,  
 36   
 37   /** 
 38    * The field to search in if when no suggestion is selected.
 39    * @field 
 40    * @public
 41    */
 42   fulltextFieldName : "",  
 43 
 44   getSolrUrl : function(start) { 
 45     var ret = "&facet=true&facet.limit=-1";
 46     for (var j = 0; j < this.fieldNames.length; j++) {
 47       ret += "&facet.field=" + this.fieldNames[j];
 48     }
 49     return ret;
 50     
 51   },
 52 
 53   handleResult : function(data) { 
 54     
 55     // create new input field
 56     jQuery(this.target).empty();
 57     var input = jQuery('<input/>').attr("id", this.id + "_input").appendTo(this.target);
 58     
 59     // create autocomplete list
 60     var list = [];
 61     for (var j = 0; j < this.fieldNames.length; j++) {
 62       var field = this.fieldNames[j];
 63       var values = data.facet_counts.facet_fields[field];  
 64       for (var i = 0; i < values.length; i = i + 2) {
 65         var label = values[i] + " (" + values[i+1] + ") - " + field;      
 66         var value = values[i];
 67         list.push({text:label, value:value, field:field});
 68       }
 69     }
 70     
 71     // add selection listeners for suggests and fulltext search.
 72     var me = this;
 73     me.selectionMade = false;
 74     input.autocomplete(list, {
 75       formatItem: function(item) {
 76         return item.text;
 77       }
 78     }).result(function(event, item) {
 79       var items =  [new jQuery.solrjs.QueryItem({field: item.field , value:item.value})];
 80       solrjsManager.selectItems(me.id, items);
 81       me.selectionMade = true;
 82     });
 83     jQuery("#" + this.id + "_input").html("test").bind("keydown", function(event) {
 84       if (me.selectionMade == false && event.keyCode==13) {
 85         var items =  [new jQuery.solrjs.QueryItem({field: me.fulltextFieldName , value:"\"" + event.target.value + "\""})];
 86         solrjsManager.selectItems(me.id, items);
 87       }
 88     });
 89   }
 90 
 91 });
